message.subject: Revised Agenda for next TAR&L meeting
message.content:
M1.1. 1. Based on discussions from the 11/8 meeting, step through a specific
US/Japan trading example for bandwidth purchased and resold by the US trading
desk, specifically determining what the US trading desk can and cannot do
with respect to each piece of the international capacity segment
[Inform: based on discussions from meeting 5 days ago, plan is to first step through an example of US/Japan trading, involving US trading desk]
M1.2. (see
attached file).
[Inform: attached document has more details]
M1.3. 2. Time permitting, step through a US/Japan trading example for bandwidth
purchased and resold by the Singapore trading desk, specifically determining
what a hypothetical Singapore trading desk could and could not do with
respect to each piece of the international capacity segment.
[Inform: if time allows, next step in plan is to go through an example involving Singapore trading desk]
M1.4. 3. Develop a prioritized plan of action specifying steps, accountabilities,
format, and timeline for each area of responsibility to work together to
provide necessary input for traders for each of the following jurisdictions:
[Inform: next step is to develop a plan of action for each of the following jurisdictions]
M1.5. Europe
Japan
Hong Kong
Australia
Singapore
Taiwan
Korea
Brazil
Mexico
Argentina
Chile
Venezuela
Colombia
[Inform: list of jurisdictions]
M1.6. 4. Review and discuss Dave Merrill's note on Korea.
[Inform: next step is to review and discuss Dave's note on Korea]
M1.7. 5. Time permitting, step through a specific US/Korea trading example as in
point one above.
[Inform: if time allows, next step is to go through a specific example of US/Korea trading like the US/Japan example]

message.subject: Revised Agenda for next TAR&L meeting
message.content:
M2.1. Greetings:
[Conventional: greetings]
M2.2. Sorry to bother you with this, but I'm travelling, and if you could leave the
call-in number for tomorrow's meeting on my voice mail, I'll be forever
indebted.
[Request-Action: leave call-in number for tomorrow's meeting on Jeff's voice mail]
Flink2.2
M2.3. Thanks a bunch.
[Conventional: thanks]
